name: Anycubic Chiron 0.4 nozzle
machine_start_gcode:
M104 S140;start the nozzle preheat and don't wait
G21;metric values
G90;absolute positioning
M82;set extruder to absolute mode
M107       ;start with the fan off
G28;home all
M190 S[bed_temperature_initial_layer_single]; set wait for bed temp
M109 S[nozzle_temperature_initial_layer] ; wait for extruder temp
G1 Z15.0 F3600 ;move the platform down 15mm
G92 E0;zero the extruded length
G1 F200 E40;extrude 40mm of feed stock
G92 E0;zero the extruded length again
G1 F3600
machine_end_gcode:
M104 S0;extruder heater off
M140 S0  ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G91;relative positioning
G1 E-4 F300;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z+10 F3600 ;move Z up a bit
G90;absolute positioning
G1 X-10 F3000; get the head off the bed
G1 F3000 Y400;kick the bed out
M84;steppers off
